SELECT GRADE_NO, APLMEM_NO, NAME, G.CORP_NO, C_NAME, WLB, PROMO_POSS, C_CULT, WFARE_PAY, MGM, EVAL, REFUSE_REASN, PRCSS_GBN, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') REG_DATE, TO_CHAR(PRCSS_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') PRCSS_DATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY GRADE_NO) RNUM FROM GRADE G JOIN MEMBER M ON (G.APLMEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) JOIN C_INFO CI ON (G.CORP_NO = CI.CORP_NO) WHERE DEL_CHK = 0 AND GRADE_NO = #{gradeNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM MEMBER M JOIN I_MEMBER IM ON (M.MEM_NO = IM.MEM_NO)

SELECT M.MEM_NO, NAME, ID, REGEXP_REPLACE(PHONE,'(.{3})(.+)(.{4})','\1-\2-\3') PHONE, EMAIL, CAT_NAME, SUBSTR(BIRTH,1,4) YEAR, SUBSTR(BIRTH,5,2) MONTH, SUBSTR(BIRTH,7,2) DAY, BIRTH TO_CHAR(JOIN_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') JOIN_DATE, TO_CHAR(WDRAWL_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') WDRAWL_DATE FROM MEMBER M JOIN I_MEMBER IM ON (M.MEM_NO = IM.MEM_NO) JOIN (SELECT CAT_NAME, SCD_CAT FROM COMM_CODE WHERE FST_CAT = 2) CC ON (IM.GENDER = CC.SCD_CAT) ORDER BY WDRAWL_DATE NULLS LAST
